subject: Claude Code Daily #1: 8 Real Use Cases

tips.title: Git Worktree Orchestration
tips.content:
Run an "Orchestrator Agent" on your main branch. Delegate subtasks to other agents running in different Git worktrees on separate branches.

```bash
# Create worktree for feature
git worktree add ../feature-auth feature/auth

# Run Claude in worktree with specific context
cd ../feature-auth && claude
```

**Why it works:** Each agent gets isolated context. No cross-contamination. Merge when ready.

tips.title: Markdown Bridge Documents
tips.content:
After every significant session, have Claude dump everything into a `.md` file with strict naming conventions.

```markdown
# SESSION_2025-12-31_auth-implementation.md

## Completed
- [x] JWT token generation
- [x] Refresh token flow

## Next Steps
- [ ] Add rate limiting

## Key Decisions
- Using RS256 for token signing
```

tips.title: The Full Automation Loop
tips.content:
The ultimate Claude Code workflow:

1. **Plan** with OpenSpec ‚Üí create concrete specification
2. **New session** ‚Üí fresh context
3. **Claude Code** ‚Üí implement
4. **Codex MCP** ‚Üí review
5. **Claude** ‚Üí fix issues
6. **Repeat** until aligned

tips.title: Manual Subagent Management
tips.content:
When you sense context limits approaching, explicitly tell Claude:

> "For each task, delegate to a subagent. You are the manager‚Äîcoordinate, don't execute."

This forces hierarchical execution and preserves main session context.

tips.title: Context7 & GitTrees MCP Servers
The Golden Rule
tips.content:
**Planning and Implementation should NEVER happen in the same session.**

| Phase | Session | Output |
|-------|---------|--------|
| PLAN | Session 1 | `FEATURE_plan.md` |
| REVIEW | Manual | User approves |
| IMPLEMENT | Session 2 | Code changes |

Fresh context = cleaner code. Always.

tips.title: The Sensei Pattern
tips.content:
Keep main context clean by using subagents liberally. Your main session is the "sensei"‚Äîit teaches and coordinates, but doesn't do the work itself.

Reference: [github.com/803/sensei](https://github.com/803/sensei)

tips.title: Date Check Discipline
tips.content:
Add to your CLAUDE.md:

```markdown
### SESSION STARTUP (MANDATORY)
1. CHECK DATE: Always verify today's date
2. LOAD BRIDGE: Read corecontext.md
3. CHECK TODO: Review active tasks
```

Prevents outdated context and ensures continuity.
